page.title: 01CHEDZOY AND SURROUNDINGS
page.content: CHEDZOY IS A VILLAGE,3.5 MILES EAST OF BRIDGWATER,SOM.CHEDZOY IS FLAT.IT HAS NO SHOPS OR POST OFFICES IT ONLY HAS A PUB CALLED THE MANOR INN AND A CHURCH CALLED ST MARYS.THERE IS ONLY A BUS ON WEDNESDAY AND SATURDAY IT ONLY GOES IN AND OUT ONCE A DAY.THERE IS ONE SCHOOL IN CHEDZOY AND THERE ARE ONLY TWO MAIN TEACHERS,MRS CLAPP THE HEAD MISTRESS AND MRS JACKSON WHO TEACHES.THERE IS A LOT OF FARMING AND A LOT OF FIELDS.SLAPE CROSS IS TWO ROADS THAT CROSS.IT GOT ITS NAME BY SOMEONE WHOSE LAST NAME WAS SLAPE AND THE TWO ROADS WHICH CROSS.THERE ARE 453 INHABITANTS.THE PARISH COUNCIL HAS SEVEN MEMBERS THE CHERMAN IS MRS CLAPP.MR WOODWARD IS VICE CHERMAN.THERE ARE MANY OLD BUILDINGS AND THERE ARE NEW BUILDINGS.THERE IS A YOUTHCLUB,PLAYGROUP AND WOMEN'S GROUP.
